summary: Email correspondence from October 2021 regarding a search for reimbursement records for a flight in August/September 2019 for an individual named 'She'. The email includes a list of hotel bookings from 2018-2019 at NYC 50 Bowery and The Frederick/Cosmopolitan Hotel, but the sender cannot find a record under the provided name.

persons.name: Annie
persons.context: Appears as a recipient (To:) of an email regarding a search for reimbursement records for a flight.

persons.name: She
persons.context: An individual for whom someone is searching for flight reimbursement records from August/September 2019, believed to have been reimbursed by 'the office'.

events.title: Flight Reimbursement Inquiry
events.description: Search for records of reimbursement for a flight taken in August and/or September 2019 for an individual named 'She'.

keyFacts: The document is an email from October 8, 2021, discussing a search for reimbursement records for a flight in August/September 2019 for an individual referred to as 'She'.
A list of hotel bookings from 2018-2019 at Hotel NYC 50 Bowery and The Frederick/Cosmopolitan Hotel is provided, but no record is found under the name 'She'.
The inquiry suggests that 'She' believed she was reimbursed by 'the office', which is indicated to be the United States Attorney's Office, Southern District of New York.
